summary: The fact that a new release is already discounted by a huge amount is unprecedented for Apple products. With 16GB of total memory and a 256GB SSD (the 512GB model is also on sale), this MacBook Air is built for multitasking and performance. Currently, Amazon is selling a great deal on the freshly released 2025 MacBook Air 13-inch, a power-laptop that only came out two months ago. At only $849, down from the original $999, this is a unique opportunity to own Apple’s latest ultra-portable powerhouse at a price that’s hard to believe.N ow is the time to act before this deal inevitably sells out.
